text: literally means star in Japanese. It may refer to: == Art== * Shijō school, a Japanese school of painting == Names == * Emperor Shijō, the 87th Emperor of Japan, * a Japanese surname ** —a Japanese kuge family descended from the == Places == * Shijō Street, one of east-west streets in the ancient capital of Heian-kyō, present-day Kyoto * Train stations ** Shijō Station, a train station on the Kyoto Municipal Subway Karasuma Line in Shimogyō-ku, Kyoto ** Gion-Shijō Station, a train station on the Keihan Main Line in Higashiyama-ku, Kyoto, formerly known as Shijō Station
title: Shijō
